scaling_analysis.interpretation: Empirical B requires nearly constant R_half vs V

alternative_derivations.hypothesis_2: Surface density - gives Σ_crit ∝ V², connects to MOND

jeans_reexamination.issue: R in Jeans formula - which scale?
jeans_reexamination.insight: δ may not be constant across galaxy types

numerical_investigation.finding: Σ_crit ∝ V^2/R with R ∝ V^0.4 gives B ≈ 1.6
numerical_investigation.interpretation: Surface density interpretation, flat R-V relation

summary.explanation_2: Wrong scale R used (R_half vs coherence scale)
